removeVowels

public static java.lang.String removeVowels(java.lang.String s)
Returns a copy of the given String with all the vowels removed. (NOTE: y is not considered a vowel)

Parameters:
s - The original String to process
Returns:
A copy of the given String with all the vowels removed. (NOTE: y is not considered a vowel)
